news.title: The regulatory path ahead for a Netflix and Warner Bros. deal could get dicey
news.summary: Netflix's deal to combine its business with WBD's streaming service HBO Max and film studio Warner Bros. is raising regulatory questions. Netflix's deal with HBO Max is also raising questions about how the two companies will work together.

news.title: David Ellison's hunt for WBD made David Zaslav richer — and it may not be over
news.summary: Paramount is considering taking an offer to WBD shareholders, sources said. Paramount thinks its deal has a better chance of gaining regulatory approval than Netflix's.

news.title: Supreme Court to hear case on Trump birthright citizenship order
news.summary: The U.S. Constitution's 14th Amendment had been understood to grant citizenship to children born in the country, even if their parents are not citizens.

news.title: Judge finalizes remedies in Google antitrust case
news.summary: A U.S. judge on Friday finalized his decision for the consequences Google will face for its search monopoly ruling. The judge added new details to the decided remedies.

news.title: SpaceX aims for $800 billion valuation in secondary share sale, WSJ reports
news.summary: Elon Musk's SpaceX is reportedly launching an insider share sale. The sale could value the company as high as $800 billion. The company is based in Hawthorne, California.

news.title: How to stress test your estate plan to make sure it’s airtight
news.summary: "If you don't understand something in a document, don’t sign it," he says. "If you’re not sure about something, don't sign it. That’s the most important thing."

news.title: Trump likes Australia’s retirement-savings program — but could it actually work in the U.S.?
news.summary: Could America's retirement-savings program look a lot like Australia's one day? Could America’s signature retirement-Savings programLook a lot of like Australia’’?

news.title: Does my friend have a right to her late father’s multimillion-dollar property portfolio? His widow claims they’re mired in debt.
news.summary: “My friend really wanted to keep her father’s condo, but her mother sold that too — and it broke her heart,” she said.

news.title: ‘I love my work’: I’m a 61-year-old Chicago public-school teacher with a $60K annual pension. Is it safe?
news.summary: “I am aware that my pension as a Chicago public school teacher is dependent on factors that are very much in flux right now,” she says.

news.title: ‘I am increasingly resentful’: My husband of 10 years has $1 million and cars worth $200K. Why won’t he give me money?
news.summary: “I maintain the household, walk the dogs and cook regular meals for us both,” she says. “I’m a very active member of the community.”
